Title: Raise a Support Ticket Through MoEngage Dashboard

readability.suggestion: Simplify long/technical sentences, especially those above grade 9.

structure.suggestion: Use more headings or break up long paragraphs into smaller chunks.

completeness.suggestion: Add step-by-step examples or case uses where appropriate.

style.assessment: Mostly active voice. Good use of action-oriented language.
style.suggestion: Use active voice. Start sentences with user actions like 'Click' or 'Enter'.

readability.assessment: Too complex for a non-technical marketer.
